sentences.english: Objective To investigate the efficacy of anisodamine in the treatment of simplex anaphylactoid purpura.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價山莨菪鹼治療單純型過敏性紫癜的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: Patches containing the drug scopolamine, used in adults, are not recommended for children.
sentences.chinese: 用的含東莨菪鹼的暈車藥，兒童應慎用。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the content of scopoletin in the roots and stalks of herba Argyreia seguinii by HPLC.
sentences.chinese: 目的測定白花銀背藤根和莖中東莨菪內酯的含量。

sentences.english: Aim To prepare compound hyoscyamine sustained-release tablets and investigate its quality.
sentences.chinese: 目的製備複方莨菪鹼緩釋片。

sentences.english: Group A, 56 cases were fed with anisodamine and Ulcerlmin suspension mixture within seven days.
sentences.chinese: 組56例鼻飼或口服硫糖鋁混懸液與山莨菪鹼混合劑。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of scopolamine and phentolamine on the discrimination learning in infant rabbits.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討東莨菪鹼和酚妥拉明對幼兔分辨學習的影響。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To establish a method for bacterial endotoxins test of Scopolamine Butylbromide Injection.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立丁溴東莨菪鹼注射液細菌內毒素檢查的方法。

sentences.english: After injecting astragalus in the points, prepared model by hypodermic injection of scopolamine.
sentences.chinese: 穴位注射黃芪注射液後，皮下注射東莨菪鹼造模。

sentences.english: XT in large dosage could also increase the brain weight in scopolamine models.
sentences.chinese: 血脈通大劑量還明顯提高東莨菪鹼模型的腦重指數。

sentences.english: Rabbit thoracic aortic rings were used to investigate the vasodilator mechanisms of scopolamine.
sentences.chinese: 用離體血管環研究了東莨菪鹼擴血管作用的機制。

sentences.english: Vit E and Anisodamine have some alleviatory effect on above changes.
sentences.chinese: 維生素E和山莨菪鹼有部分保護作用。

sentences.english: The possible mechanisms of cellular protection of anisodamine was discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文還對山莨菪鹼的細胞保護機制作了進一步分析。

sentences.english: For more severe symptoms, he recommends taking scopolamine or promethazine.
sentences.chinese: 對於更加嚴重的症狀，他推薦服用東莨菪鹼或異丙嗪。

sentences.english: B group patients were treated as A group patients except without scopolamine.
sentences.chinese: 組除不用東莨菪鹼外，其他治療同A組。

sentences.english: These results indicate that scopolamine inhibited respiratory centers in the rabbit.
sentences.chinese: 結果提示東莨菪鹼對呼吸中樞產生抑制效應。

sentences.english: It is suggested that the site of action of anisodamine could be the phospholipase A2 reaction .
sentences.chinese: 結果提示山莨菪鹼作用發生在磷脂酶A_2水平。

definition: old term for 糖苷[tang2 gan1], glycoside
